values.name: v2023_04_01
values.description: The 2023-04-01 service API version

values.name: v2023_09_01_preview
values.description: The 2023-09-01-preview service API version

code.description: One of a server-defined set of error codes.

message.description: A human-readable representation of the error.

details.description: An array of details about specific errors that led to this reported error.

innererror.description: An object containing more specific information than the current object about the error.

Azure.Core.Foundations.InnerError.description: An object containing more specific information about the error. As per Microsoft One API guidelines - https://github.com/Microsoft/api-guidelines/blob/vNext/Guidelines.md#7102-error-condition-responses.

code.description: One of a server-defined set of error codes.

CloudError.description: An error response from the service.

CloudErrorBody.description: An error response from the service.

code.description:
An identifier for the error. Codes are invariant and are intended to be
consumed programmatically.

message.description:
A message describing the error, intended to be suitable for display in a user
interface.

target.description:
The target of the particular error. For example, the name of the property in
error.

details.description: A list of additional details about the error.

name.description: Display name for the Dev Box

projectName.description: Name of the project this Dev Box belongs to

poolName.description: The name of the Dev Box pool this machine belongs to.

hibernateSupport.description: Indicates whether hibernate is enabled/disabled or unknown.

provisioningState.description: The current provisioning state of the Dev Box.

actionState.description:
The current action state of the Dev Box. This is state is based on previous
action performed by user.

powerState.description: The current power state of the Dev Box.

uniqueId.description:
A unique identifier for the Dev Box. This is a GUID-formatted string (e.g.
00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000).

error.description: Provisioning or action error details. Populated only for error states.

location.description:
Azure region where this Dev Box is located. This will be the same region as the
Virtual Network it is attached to.

osType.description: The operating system type of this Dev Box.

user.description: The AAD object id of the user this Dev Box is assigned to.

hardwareProfile.description: Information about the Dev Box's hardware resources

storageProfile.description: Storage settings for this Dev Box

imageReference.description: Information about the image used for this Dev Box

createdTime.description: Creation time of this Dev Box

localAdministrator.description: Indicates whether the owner of the Dev Box is a local administrator.

DevBoxAction.description: An action which will take place on a Dev Box.

actionType.description: The action that will be taken.

sourceId.description: The id of the resource which triggered this action

suspendedUntil.description: The earliest time that the action could occur (UTC).

next.description: Details about the next run of this action.

result.description: The result of the delay operation on this action.

error.description: Information about the error that occurred. Only populated on error.

values.name: Succeeded
values.description: The delay operation succeeded.

values.name: Failed
values.description: The delay operation failed.

values.name: Stop
values.description: The action will stop the Dev Box.

DevBoxNextAction.description: Details about the next run of an action.

scheduledTime.description: The time the action will be triggered (UTC).

parameters.description: Parameters object for the environment.

user.description: The AAD object id of the owner of this Environment.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the environment.

resourceGroupId.description: The identifier of the resource group containing the environment's resources.

error.description: Provisioning error details. Populated only for error states.

id.description: The ID of the environment definition.

description.description: A short description of the environment definition.

parameters.description: Input parameters passed to an environment.

parametersSchema.description: JSON schema defining the parameters object passed to an environment.

templatePath.description: Path to the Environment Definition entrypoint file.

EnvironmentDefinitionParameter.description: Properties of an Environment Definition parameter

type.description:
A string of one of the basic JSON types (number, integer, array, object,
boolean, string)

readOnly.description:
Whether or not this parameter is read-only.  If true, default should have a
value.

required.description: Whether or not this parameter is required

EnvironmentOperation.description: Information about an operation on an environment.

uri.description: The unique URI for the environment operation.

operationId.description: Unique identifier for the environment operation.

createdByObjectId.description: The object ID of the actor which initiated the operation.

environmentParameters.description: Parameters object for the environment at the time of the operation.

error.description: Provisioning or operation error details. Populated only for error states.

values.name: NotStarted
values.description: The operation has not started.

values.name: Running
values.description: The operation is running.

values.name: Succeeded
values.description: The operation succeeded.

values.name: Canceled
values.description: The operation was canceled.

values.name: Failed
values.description: The operation failed.

deploymentTargetId.description:
Id of a subscription or management group that the environment type will be
mapped to. The environment's resources will be deployed into this subscription
or management group.

status.description: Indicates whether this environment type is enabled for use in this project.

values.name: Enabled
values.description: The environment type is enabled for use in the project.

values.name: Disabled
values.description: The environment type is not enabled for use in the project.

EnvironmentUpdateProperties.description:
Properties of an environment. These properties can be updated after the
resource has been created.

parameters.description: Parameters object for the environment.

HardwareProfile.description: Hardware specifications for the Dev Box.

vCPUs.description: The number of vCPUs available for the Dev Box.

memoryGB.description: The amount of memory available for the Dev Box.

values.name: Disabled

values.name: OsUnsupported
values.description: Hibernate is not supported by the operating system.

operatingSystem.description: The operating system of the image.

osBuildNumber.description: The operating system build number of the image.

publishedDate.description: The datetime that the backing image version was published.

values.name: Enabled
values.description: Owners of Dev Boxes in the pool are local administrators on the Dev Boxes.

values.description: Owners of Dev Boxes in the pool are not local administrators on the Dev Boxes.

diskSizeGB.description: The size of the OS Disk in gigabytes.

percentComplete.description: Percent of the operation that is complete

properties.description: Custom operation properties, populated only for a successful operation.

values.name: array
values.description: The parameter accepts an array of values.

location.description: Azure region where Dev Boxes in the pool are located

osType.description: The operating system type of Dev Boxes in this pool

hardwareProfile.description: Hardware settings for the Dev Boxes created in this pool

hibernateSupport.description: Indicates whether hibernate is enabled/disabled or unknown.

storageProfile.description: Storage settings for Dev Box created in this pool

imageReference.description: Image settings for Dev Boxes create in this pool

localAdministrator.description:
Indicates whether owners of Dev Boxes in this pool are local administrators on
the Dev Boxes.

stopOnDisconnect.description: Stop on disconnect configuration settings for Dev Boxes created in this pool.

healthStatus.description:
Overall health status of the Pool. Indicates whether or not the Pool is
available to create Dev Boxes.

values.name: Unknown
values.description: The pool health status is not known.

values.name: Pending
values.description: The pool health status waiting for health checks to run.

values.name: Healthy
values.description: The pool health status is healthy.

values.name: Warning
values.description: The pool health status has one or more warnings.

values.name: Unhealthy
values.description: The pool health status is not healthy.

values.name: Unknown
values.description: The Dev Box power state is not known.

values.name: Running
values.description: The Dev Box is running.

values.name: Deallocated
values.description: The Dev Box is deallocated.

values.name: PoweredOff
values.description: The Dev Box is powered off.

values.name: Hibernated
values.description: The Dev Box is hibernated.

maxDevBoxesPerUser.description:
When specified, indicates the maximum number of Dev Boxes a single user can
create across all pools in the project.

RemoteConnection.description: Provides remote connection information for a Dev Box.

webUrl.description: URL to open a browser based RDP session.

rdpConnectionUrl.description: Link to open a Remote Desktop session.

type.description: Supported type this scheduled task represents.

frequency.description: The frequency of this scheduled task.

time.description: The target time to trigger the action. The format is HH:MM.

timeZone.description: The IANA timezone id at which the schedule should execute.

values.name: Daily
values.description: The scheduled task will run every day.

values.name: StopDevBox
values.description: The scheduled task will stop impacted Dev Boxes.

StopOnDisconnectConfiguration.description: Stop on disconnect configuration settings for Dev Boxes created in this pool.

status.description:
Indicates whether the feature to stop the devbox on disconnect once the grace
period has lapsed is enabled.

gracePeriodMinutes.description:
The specified time in minutes to wait before stopping a Dev Box once disconnect
is detected.

values.name: Enabled
values.description: Stop on disconnect is enabled on the Dev Box.

values.name: Disabled
values.description: Stop on disconnect is not enabled on the Dev Box.

StorageProfile.description: Storage settings for the Dev Box's disks

osDisk.description: Settings for the operating system disk.
